Translations.Text: Allaha dina o ratrira paribartana ghatana. Ete arntadrsti-sampannaganera jan'ye cintara upakarana rayeche.

Allaha pratyeka calanta jibake pani dbara srsti karechena. Tadera kataka buke bhaya diye cale, kataka du'i paye bhara diye cale ebam kataka cara paye bhara diye cale; allaha ya iccha srsti karena. Niscaya'i allaha sabakichu karate saksama.
Ami to suspasta ayata samuha abartirna karechi. Allaha yake iccha sarala pathe paricalana karena.
Tara baleh amara allaha o rasulera prati bisbasa sthapana karechi ebam anugatya kari; kintu atahpara tadera ekadala mukha phiriye neya ebam tara bisbasi naya.
Tadera madhye phayasala karara jan'ya yakhana taderake allaha o rasulera dike ahabana kara haya takhana tadera ekadala mukha phiriye neya.
Satya tadera sbapakse hale tara binitabhabe rasulera kache chute ase.
Tadera antare ki roga ache, na tara dhomkaya pare ache; na tara bhaya kare ye, allaha o tamra rasula tadera prati abicara karabena? Baram tara'i to abicarakari

muminadera baktabya kebala e katha'i yakhana tadera madhye phayasala karara jan'ye allaha o tamra rasulera dike taderake ahabana kara haya, takhana tara baleh amara sunalama o adesa man'ya karalama. Tara'i saphalakama.
Yara allaha o tamra rasulera anugatya kare allahake bhaya kare o tamra sasti theke bemce thake tara'i krtakarya.

Tara drrhabhabe allahara kasama kheye bale ye, apani taderake adesa karale tara sabakichu chere bera habe'i. Balunah tomara kasama kheyo na. Niyamanuyayi tomadera anugatya, tomara ya kichu kara niscaya allaha se bisaye jnata.
